articles.description: The clock is counting down to the debut flight of the rocket that will send people back to the Moon.
articles.content:
By Jonathan AmosBBC Science Correspondent, Cape Canaveral
The American space agency is counting down to the lift-off of its giant new Moon rocket - the Space Launch System.
